questions.question: What is the primary color of the visible label text on the product?
What is the overall shape of the container holding the tablets?
What is the stated serving size of the product, as shown on the label?
What is the main nutrient or ingredient listed prominently on the label?
What is the dosage, in milligrams, of the primary ingredient per serving?
What is the color of the background of the main label section?
What is the style of the text font used on the label's main section?
What is the type of information displayed in the topmost section of the label?
What is indicated about the Daily Value of the listed ingredient?
What unit of measurement is used for the amount per serving of the listed ingredient?
What is the texture of the label's surface, given its visual appearance?
What is the overall print quality of the text and markings on the label?
Considering the image, what is the apparent material of the product's label?
What is the relative size of the text in relation to the label area?
What is the overall design style of the label; simple or complex?
